import { Component } from '@angular/core'; //Variables globales declare var window: any @Component({ selector: 'app-agregar-inventario', templateUrl: './agregar-inventario.component.html', styleUrls: ['./agregar-inventario.component.css'] }) export class AgregarInventarioComponent { inventio formModal: any; ngOnInit(): void { this.formModal = new window.bootstrap.Modal(document.getElementById("modal-inv")); } //Modales desplegarModal() { this.formModal.show(); } cerraModal() { this.formModal.hide() } }

Agregue nuevo inventario
